title: Create a Style Guide for Imagery
description: A creative director wants to create a style guide to ensure all images used in marketing have a consistent look and feel.

tasks.description: Define the desired style for photography (e.g., 'Bright, airy, with natural light').
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent specifies the overall mood and lighting.

tasks.description: Specify rules for image composition, such as color palettes and subject matter.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent defines the visual rules for all marketing images.

tasks.description: Create a document with examples of 'on-brand' and 'off-brand' images.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent produces a clear visual guide for the team to follow.
